data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, William Pottker for Internacional is whistled offside.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Internacional throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima blows against Bragantino's Claudinho for offside.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 5, Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Internacional.
Internacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 8, Bruno Tubarao for Bragantino drives towards goal at Nabizao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Internacional.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Internacional have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 11, In Braganca Paulista Internacional drive forward through Gabriel Boschilia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Braganca Paulista, Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Internacional at Nabizao.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Internacional at Nabizao.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Bragantino.
In the minute 15, In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 17, Goal! Internacional have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Thiago Galhardo.
Great play from Heitor to set up the goal.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, Attention is being given to Bragantinoâ€™s Alerrandro and play has been suspended briefly.
Can Internacional capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Alerrandro for Bragantino is back on the field again.
In the minute 22, Internacional's Edenilson is on target but unsuccessful.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
Claudinho (Bragantino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 25, Thiago Galhardo heads in to give Internacional a 0-2 lead at Nabizao.
That's a fine assist from Edenilson.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 27, Bragantino to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 29, Bragantino's Ricardo Ryller has been booked in Braganca Paulista.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 31, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Victor Cuesta for Internacional has been booked by Felipe Fernandes de Lima and receives a first yellow card.
Bragantino drive forward but Bruno Tubarao is judged offside.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
The match at Nabizao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alerrandro, who is down injured.
In the minute 35, The home team has substituted Alerrandro with Ytalo. Mauricio Barbieri is thus making his first change.
Thiago Galhardo of Internacional smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Braganca Paulista to check on Thiago Galhardo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 37, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Bragantino throw-in in Internacional's half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 38, Thiago Galhardo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Internacional.
Throw-in Bragantino.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 39, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a throw-in for Bragantino, close to Internacional's area.
In the minute 41, Free kick Internacional.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
In the minute 42, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In Braganca Paulista Bragantino attack through Bruno Tubarao. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Internacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino's Edimar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Internacional at Nabizao.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Gabriel Boschilia of Internacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
The first-half has come to a close in Braganca Paulista.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 47, Artur (Bragantino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bruno Tubarao for the home team is judged to be offside.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Internacional.
Important block from the Internacional defence as Bruno Tubarao fires in a strike for Bragantino.
In the minute 50, Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bragantino's Aderlan gets in a shot on goal at Nabizao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Internacional.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Bragantino.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Internacional are coming forward and Patrick gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Free kick Bragantino.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In the minute 60, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Internacional throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 62, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino just outside Internacional's area.
Leandrinho is on a sub for Artur for Bragantino.
Mauricio Barbieri is making the team's third substitution at Nabizao with Thonny Anderson replacing Claudinho.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Ricardo Ryller with Uillian Correia. This is the second substitution made today by Mauricio Barbieri.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In the minute 65, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Internacional a goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Internacional make their second substitution with Andres D'Alessandro replacing Thiago Galhardo.
In the minute 66, Eduardo Coudet (Internacional) is making a first substitution, with Rodrigo Moledo replacing Patrick.
Free kick Bragantino.
Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Internacional.
Edenilson (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 69, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Edimar is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Edimar is booked for the home team.
In the minute 71, Edimar is back on his feet again.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marcos Guilherme is replacing Gabriel Boschilia for Internacional at Nabizao.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Internacional.
Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Braganca Paulista.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Internacional throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional at Nabizao.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in Bragantino.
Can Bragantino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Internacional's half?
In the minute 81, Free kick in a good position for Bragantino!
Rodrigo Lindoso (Internacional) has received a yellow card from Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Bragantino are pushing forward but Edimar's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 82, Internacional have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Bragantino.
Free kick Internacional.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 83, Eduardo Coudet is making the team's fourth substitution at Nabizao with Abel Hernandez replacing William Pottker.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 84, At Nabizao, Uillian Correia has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Luis Phelipe is replacing Bruno Tubarao for the home team.
In the minute 85, Thonny Anderson (Bragantino) has been sent off!
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Edenilson.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 88, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In Braganca Paulista, Ligger of Bragantino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bragantino's Leandrinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Internacional defender.
In the minute 89, Edenilson is back on the pitch.
At Nabizao the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Internacional.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
